normalized: the next day――
rinko had been able to meet tatsurou in the general course students' cafeteria.
naturally, tatsurou was surprised that rinko had become a maid course student.
tatsurou had said the maid clothes―which she personally thought were cute, but had been worried how he would feel―suited her.
she had felt nervous when he lost his temper due to kuroi's insolent attitude, and was about to use his powers, but even so, rinko was happy that that was because he was thinking of her.
however, the briefing session after that had been horrible.
kousaka shizuru, who she had thought was an amiable veteran taimanin, had exposed her true nature.

name: shizuru
normalized: fufu, tatsurou-kun♪
what had that shameless older woman been thinking?
she had appeared fresh out of the bath in only a towel, and had started to make vulgar moves on tatsurou, even though his big sister, rinko, was right in front of her eyes.
she acted like his girlfriend, calling tatsurou things like 『takkun』, rubbing her body against him intentionally, and grabbing his arm and inserting it between her breasts.
that alone was inexcusable, yet the woman had fired off a rude remark like this towards rinko.

name: shizuru
normalized: takkun likes adult women more than his virgin brocon sister, right?
naturally, that was not something she could forgive.
rinko had tried to slay shizuru on the spot, but she had been stopped from doing so by tatsurou.
tatsurou, who by all rights should have gotten angry that his sister had been insulted, had conversely taken that woman's side.
furthermore, he had opposed rinko's suggestion that they should perform the force infiltration immediately, and agreed with that woman's opinion.
because of that, she realized.
tatsurou had been seduced by that kousaka shizuru's charms.
if she thought about it, it was no wonder.
kousaka shizuru was an infiltration specialist who had made a success of a great number of missions.
naturally, she used her “womanly” weapons in those, even including seducing men prior to the infiltration.
her code name, “flower shizuru”, wasn't just based on having the ability to control plants.
it also signified that she herself was a flower――a poisonous flower which drove men mad with its allure.
there was no denying that that itself was the way of the kunoichi.
it wasn't to rinko's liking, but that was also an important ability for a taimanin.
however, it was different when it came to using that on her precious little brother for fun.
she could absolutely not overlook that.
no matter what it took, she would keep that woman away from tatsurou.
and if―she didn't even want to think about this, but if―shizuru had already done something that would cause tatsurou to make a mistake――

name: rinko
normalized: （i'll have to kill that woman.
she decided in her mind.

name: rinko
normalized: （it's this place, huh…?
rinko was in front of the washizu material co.
research facility.
after leaping out of shizuru's room, she had headed here without hesitation.
this was because the first step in her strategy was to observe enemy movements before carrying out the force infiltration.
it also had the purpose of calming her mind after she had, in spite of herself, become enraged in the preparatory meeting.
naturally, her rattled mind had already calmed down.
rinko sank down on the outer edge of the forest, and watched the research facility intently.
from the terrain, defence system, and footprints that the guards had left on the ground up to this point, she more or less grasped the scale of the security.
it wasn't like tatsurou, who performed searches with his wind, or yukikaze, who sensed electronic equipment with her skin, but she could tell some substantial things.

name: rinko
normalized: hmph.
security's tight for a company's research facility.
rinko deliberately verbalized as she stood straight up.
she normally couldn't talk to herself in the middle of reconnaissance.
as such, she had done so deliberately.
so that it would be heard by the person behind her.

name: rinko
normalized: now, i wonder what you want with me?
rinko once again addressed the darkness of the forest behind her.
no reaction came back to her.
she couldn't hear a single breath, or a rustling of clothes.
but they were there.
who was it?

name: rinko
normalized: i'll commend you for having been able to get this close to me.
but if you don't answer my questions――
zashuu!
without looking back, rinko drew her favourite sword, “ishikiri kanemitsu”, and slashed behind her.
her slash attack cut through the darkness of night.

name: rinko
normalized: （what?!
there had been no effect.
zazah!
instead, someone had appeared from the darkness.

name: rinko
normalized: i misjudged the distance?!
there she was.

name: rinko
normalized: （her, huh…?
rinko understood at a glance.
it was the rubber woman who had attacked tatsurou and shizuru.

name: rinko
normalized: （this woman can do that?!
rinko had supposedly grasped the distance from her mysterious opponent perfectly.
her deadly drawn sword should have left her enemy alive long enough to be able to interrogate her.
however, in actuality, her enemy had been out of range, and her drawn sword had fruitlessly cut through the air.
that was no doubt the technique of a swordsman who had reached the level of “kensei”.
(tl: literally “sword sage” or “sword master”, a prestigious honorary title reserved for someone with a supreme mastery of swordsmanship.
one who possessed the secret of pushing her own bloodlust out forward, and making her enemy swordsman misjudge the distance from her.
however, for her to use that on rinko, who was hailed as the strongest stray blade style swordsman in history…

name: rinko
normalized: that's a ridiculous appearance, but i suppose you must be a person of renown.
let's hear your name.
rinko said, in the middle-level posture, where she would be able to deal with any kind of movement from her enemy, and stared past the point of her sword at the rubber woman.
(tl: chuudan-no-kamae, “middle-level posture”, is the most basic swordfighting stance, in which the blade is held directly in front of the fighter and pointed forward at their opponent.
in place of an answer, the rubber woman rushed at her.
the enemy's weapons were steel claws.
their range was far shorter than rinko's longsword.
consequently, she would have to close the distance to wound rinko.
nevertheless, there was no enemy who would charge straight at a swordsman head-on.
to do that towards an opponent whose sword was aimed at their eye was the same as saying, 「please cut me.
however, the rubber woman did that.
without any kind of hesitation, she closed the distance in a straight line.

name: rinko
normalized: don't underestimate me!
naturally, rinko engaged her.
perfectly seeing through the rubber woman's movements, which were too quick for the eye, she raised her longsword overhead, and swung it downward from above.
it was a bisecting strike, which would literally cut her enemy in half from the head down.
however, the rubber woman dodged that.
pitah!
she came to an abrupt halt, as though she had completely disregarded the laws of physics, and let the deadly blade pass by in front of her eyes by a paper-thin margin.
and then, while avoiding the katana, she fired countless kunai toward rinko with movement which didn't seem human.
however, that much was within rinko's expectations.

name: rinko
normalized: laughable!
a wry smile appeared on the slasher oni.

name: rinko
normalized: ninja art “＜phantasmic bubble＞”!
she had already made her symbolic hand gestures.
little light bubbles spawned like a meteor shower, and made contact with the kunai that were flying at her.
the rain of countless light bubbles made the kunai vanish into some other space.

name: rinko
normalized: i'll take those legs!
the slasher oni rushed to attack her enemy in their moment of weakness.
the distance between rinko and the rubber woman shrunk to a range where they could kill each other.
when it came to simple clashes, the person with the wider range would win.
and with rinko's sword attack, she would probably be able to cut the rubber woman in two, claws and all.
it looked like the match had been decided.

name: rinko
normalized: kuh?!
it was rinko who had drawn back from the overwhelmingly favourable distance.
kunai rained down from the sky one after another, in the spot where rinko had been until a few moments earlier.
and what's more, from a place other than where her phantasmic bubbles were.

name: rinko
normalized: （no way, even anticipating “phantasmic bubble”?!
that was impossible.
but it was all she could think of.
the rubber woman knew about rinko's move and had predicted everything, so she had hurled her kunai toward the sky in advance.

name: rinko
normalized: （who the hell is this?
does she know me?!
the faint sense of panic from that slightly dulled rinko's movements.
she had dodged the first wave of kunai from the sky.
however, surprisingly, the enemy had also anticipated rinko would avoid that, and fired a second wave.
juhh!
a faint pain in her back.
one of the kunai, which had flown in from a total blind spot, had grazed rinko's body.
it wasn't a direct hit.
but it had cut open the thin skin of her back, and a very slight gash had formed.

name: rinko
normalized: to meet a fighter of this calibre in a place like this…!
despite shuddering, rinko felt her slasher oni spirit flaring up more than her fear.
admiration and joy towards a worthy opponent, which she had encountered for the first time in ages.
that was the nature of an incorrigible swordfighter.
however, that joy immediately turned to disappointment.
the “rubber woman” had performed an unexpected action.
she had run away.

name: rinko
normalized: do you intend to mock me?!
was she saying rinko wasn't an opponent worth killing, or something?
as far as rinko was concerned, that was the ultimate insult.

name: rinko
normalized: you bitch, i won't forgive you!
without hesitating, rinko chased after the rubber woman.
no, tried to chase after.

name: rinko
normalized: kuh…
she immediately noticed something abnormal about herself.
the scratch that she had received on her back had started to become hot and painful.
that heat spread throughout her body in no time.
her heart began screaming like an alarm bell.
sweat suddenly broke out all over her body, and her breathing became strangely rough.

name: rinko
normalized: haah, haah… that's why, huh…?
there was no doubt that a poison had been spread over those kunai.
that was why the woman had withdrawn.
did she think there was no need to deliver the finishing blow to rinko?

name: rinko
normalized: dammit… i… screwed up…
she took out her standard treatment kit, and immediately injected an antidote.
as long as it wasn't a very unique poison, she would be able to get rid of it with this.
however, her wounded pride as a stray blade style swordsman would not return unless she defeated that woman.

name: rinko
normalized: i'll definitely have her pay for th――hah?!
someone was rapidly approaching.
fast.
they drew near rinko at incredible speed.
had the rubber woman come back?
or was it a different enemy?!

name: rinko
normalized: kuhh!
the detoxification wasn't finished yet.
rinko tightly gripped her longsword, and readied it with shaking hands.
a blow the instant they met.
she had no choice but to bring them down with that.

name: rinko
normalized: dammit!
she boosted her spiritual energy as high as she could with her feverishly hot body, and was about to unleash a slash attack with all her might, when that moment――

name: rinko
normalized: （eh?!

name: tatsurou
normalized: rinko-nee!
the one who had rushed out of the forest was tatsurou.
his face had turned pale.

name: rinko
normalized: t, tatsurou?!

name: tatsurou
normalized: rinko-nee, are you all right?!
she didn't know how, but it looked like he had realized that rinko had been hurt, and come running.

name: rinko
normalized: （so you were worried about your sister, tatsurou…）
dokun.

name: rinko
normalized: uuhh…
she felt the depths of her body throb hard.

name: rinko
normalized: （wh, what was that just now…?!
rinko reflexively pressed down on her own chest.
rinko hadn't yet realized that that was a sexual ache caused by an aphrodisiac poison.
